content.data:
[Y]Model Family
[W]464, 664, 6128: same soul, different
[W]loadout.
[c][m.]
[W]The 464 brought tape convenience, the
[W]664 introduced built-in disk, and the
[W]6128 pushed memory further.
[W]All three shared a tidy out-of-box
[W]setup that families could actually
[W]manage.
[c][m.]
[G]- 464: tape era icon.
[G]- 664: short but important run.
[G]- 6128: the all-rounder.
[m][m-]
[Y]HISTORY
[C]Bundled monitor plus power design
[C]reduced setup chaos.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
